Html:
Obviously something to be looked at way down the track once things are all running nicely and we actually know how the gear scaling works in challenge modes.

With the scaling they mention that you will stay at hit/expertise caps if you are there in your current gear but your other stats will scale up/down.    With various haste caps being important in maximising DPS (which will be needed for those serious about challenge modes) it would be useful to have a tool to allow you to maximise your gear accordingly.     Perhaps through the boss handler?

There is so much unknown about how the scaling will work that there is little point even looking at the issue yet but I thought i'd throw the idea out there so it is in peoples minds when and if it becomes possible.
This is definitely something we plan to support.
